seo.title: choise.com tokenomics
seo.description: In the fast-growing cryptocurrency market, Choise.com is to lead the way as a single entry platform to yield products. Choise.com delivers complex yield-focused and cryptobanking products through a fun and friendly UI/UX.

description.description: In the fast-growing cryptocurrency market, Choise.com is to lead the way as a single entry platform to yield products. To put it simply, here you can earn on crypto holdings through the same tools previously reserved for advanced crypto users. All through a clear interface, of course.
description.title: choise.com ecosystem

underlyingTokens.title: tokenomics. underlying tokens
underlyingTokens.description: Choise.com tokenomics is based on two tokens at the heart of the project – CRPT and CHO.
underlyingTokens.description_crpt: CRPT is one of the key players inside the Choise.com ecosystem, ensuring fast and secure value transfer while maintaining crypto-to-fiat transactions. Every time when such a transaction appears inside Choise.com wallet, a 0.5% gas fee in CRPT tokens is charged and burned monthly.
underlyingTokens.description_cho: CHO token is an entry point to the advantages of Choise.com DeFi products. Its tokenomics is based on cutting-edge practices from the industry and is presented by a deflationary model. The total number of tokens is capped at 1 billion subject to be burned over the time.
